Articles.Content:
Welcome to Jeb's Diner!

How it works:

One player asks for there meal... and the other messes it up!

Player 1: I would like the BLT

Player 2: Okay! Here's your SRB!

I would like a _________

And so on...

Rules:

No inaproriate stuff

All of Jeb's waiters ALWAYS get stuff wrong, so your must also get these orders wrong (puns are accepted)

I'll start

I will have the soup.

Edited September 28, 2014 by MrWalrus123

Okay! Here's your kerosene!

Uh...may I have the Joojeh Kebab boneless with white rice please?

Jeb's wobblewub, strutless, with dry ice. Right away!

I'd like a pizza.

Here's your rocket fuel soup.

I would like a Kraken soup with a touch of Danny2462.

Ok. Here's your boring lobster, with a disk copy of KSP.

I would like CHOCOLAAAAAAAAATE!!!! CHOCOLATE!!!!! CHOCOLATE!1!1!11one!11!! *begins chasing waiter*

Shock-a-plate? Okay, your heatshield is comin'

I'd like a LOX-infused RP1 flavored icecream with an SRB-caramel topping, please.

Here's your DQ Caramel Sundae.

I would like a NerdCubed sandwich with Cleverbot bread.

Here's your danny2462 planet buster

I would like an srb pancake with some strut bacon

Heres your Nerva Cake and broken strut soup

I'd like carbonated Liquid fuel and Bacon sandwich.

Here's your Explosive Entree.

I'd like a nothing.

You've failed your contract!

I'd like a Kerbal sundae, please.

One kraken saturday coming right up!

I would like some vall and eeloo flavored ice please.

Vile yellow rice? You are a gourmet, sir.

May I have some fake tortoise soup, please?

Wait, did you want the tortoise soup or the walrus soup?

I'll have 2 Srb pancakes.

22 Rocket Destruction Corporation pancaches here

I wouldlike a failed contract

Veiled contempt? That was to be expected from someone like you.

I would like the Gordon Brownie special.

Ok a rocket brwonie coming right up!

I would like a SRB please thanks.

a srm? ok its fitted to a mech that hates you

I would like to have a GIANT NUKE GI-ANT-NU-KE

Camelot? Ok camel soup coming ur way!

I would like a tiger

A flier? Sure! One Boeing 747 for the... thing...

Waiter, i would desire a cracker...

Here is your Kracken Kracker

I would like cheese

Here's a letter to the president of Switzerland telling him that you are now in control.

I want some Swiss cheese. IRL.

Here's your Soyuz that came from a wormhole

I demand a football stadium. Did I mention that I'm a giant alien?

One order of Football Radium coming right up!

I'll have a cheesburger, plain, with bacon, cheddar cheese, two cups of ranch on the side, and a side of french fries.

Okay, here's your plain in Germany with a cattle ranch nearby!

I'll have the HypeSoup.
